Morgan Investment Management, Inc.","inceptionDate":"2007-05-14","investmentObjectiveAndStrategy":"The investment objective of the Fund is to provide investors with long-term capital appreciation by investing at least 70% of its non-cash assets in equity securities of companies whose predominant business will benefit from, or is related to, the growth in Asian economies.
